```{r echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}

library(fs)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
```

## Reimportation de données

```{r}

data <- read_csv("data/raw/2022-12-20_owid-co2-data.csv")
data_tbl <- as.tibble(data)
skim(data)
```

## Données Extremes

```{r}
p1 <- ggplot(data = data,
       mapping = aes(x = year))

p1 + geom_histogram()
```

```{r}

data %>%
    filter(country == "Afghanistan") %>%
    select(year, population, iso_code, cumulative_luc_co2)
```

```{r}

p2 <- ggplot(data = data,
             mapping = aes(x = country, y = population))
p2 + geom_boxplot()
```

## Evolution du ratio country/co2

```{r}

data %>%
    group_by(country, co2) %>%
    summarise(new = n()) %>%
    mutate(new1 = new / sum(new) * 100)
evolution <- group_by(.data = data, country, co2) %>%
    summarise(n = n())

evolution <- evolution %>% mutate(pourcent = n / sum(n) * 100)
```

```{r}

p3 <- ggplot(evolution, aes(x = country, y = pourcent))

p3 + geom_line()
```

## Peut-être que ça vous inspirera!

```{r plotly, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(gapminder)
df <- gapminder

fig <- df %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~ gdpPercap,
    y = ~ lifeExp,
    size = ~ pop,
    color = ~ continent,
    frame = ~ year,
    text = ~ country,
    hoverinfo = "text",
    type = 'scatter',
    mode = 'markers',
    width = "100%",
    height = 600
  )

fig <- fig %>% layout(xaxis = list(type = "log"))

fig <- fig %>%
  animation_button(
    x = 0, xanchor = "left", y = -0.15, yanchor = "bottom"
  )
fig
```
